org.zeromq.api

Interface BinaryStarReactor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryStarReactorImpl

    public interface BinaryStarReactor
    Reactor implementing the Binary Star pattern, used to construct HA-pairs that can forward messages to an application in an event-driven manner.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BinaryStarReactor.Event
      Events, which start with the states our peer can be in.
      static class  BinaryStarReactor.Mode
      Startup modes.
      static class  BinaryStarReactor.State
      States we can be in at any point in time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long BSTAR_HEARTBEAT
      We send state information this often.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Reactor getReactor()
      Get the underlying Reactor.
      void registerVoterSocket(Socket socket)
      Register a client voter socket.
      void setActiveHandler(LoopHandler handler)
      Register a handler to be called each time there's a state change.
      void setHeartbeatInterval(long heartbeatInterval)
      Set the heartbeat interval used to detect peer outage.
      void setPassiveHandler(LoopHandler handler)
      Register a handler to be called each time there's a state change.
      void setVoterHandler(LoopHandler handler)
      Register a voter handler to be called each time the application receives a message.
      void start()
      Start the underlying Reactor.
      void stop()
      Stop the underlying Reactor.

    • Field Detail

      • BSTAR_HEARTBEAT

        static final long BSTAR_HEARTBEAT
        We send state information this often. If peer doesn't respond in two heartbeats, it is 'dead'.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Start the underlying Reactor.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the underlying Reactor.

      • registerVoterSocket

        void registerVoterSocket(Socket socket)
        Register a client voter socket. Only one socket can be registered.
        Parameters:
        socket - The client socket

      • setVoterHandler

        void setVoterHandler(LoopHandler handler)
        Register a voter handler to be called each time the application receives a message.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler for client events

      • setActiveHandler

        void setActiveHandler(LoopHandler handler)
        Register a handler to be called each time there's a state change.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler for state change events

      • setPassiveHandler

        void setPassiveHandler(LoopHandler handler)
        Register a handler to be called each time there's a state change.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler for state change events

      • getReactor

        Reactor getReactor()
        Get the underlying Reactor.
        Returns:
        The underlying Reactor

      • setHeartbeatInterval

        void setHeartbeatInterval(long heartbeatInterval)
        Set the heartbeat interval used to detect peer outage.
        Parameters:
        heartbeatInterval - The heartbeat interval, in milliseconds
